post.title: wind internet settings (apns)
post.content: for both data and mms to function, you need to set up two apns: data --------------------------- name: wind ca apn: internet.windmobile.ca mcc: 302 mnc: 490 type: default,supl mms --------------------------- name: wind ca mms apn: mms.windmobile.ca mmsc: http://mms.windmobile.ca mms proxy: 74.115.197.70 mms port: 8080 mcc: 302 mnc: 490 type: mms on android phones, this can be configured in settings > wireless networks > mobile networks > access point names > menu > new apn. be sure to select menu > save apn when done entering the above information.
